synopsis.text:
Will ful and adventurous, fourth-grader Kouichi Uehara stumbles upon an extraordinary discovery one day - a fossilized baby Kappa, whom he affectionately names Coo. Living in the bustling outskirts of Tokyo, Kouichi and his family welcome Coo into their home, embracing him as one of their own. However, life among humans proves challenging for Coo, as he grapples with nostalgia for his own kind and the harsh realities of a modern world.

Embarking on a daring quest to find Coo's family, the duo's search leads them through a series of thrilling escapades. Coo, who has been hidden away for centuries, must now confront the tragic loss of his father at the hands of a samurai and the daunting prospect of being the last of his kind. As the media catches wind of this enigmatic creature, Coo's life is thrust into the spotlight, forcing him to make a difficult decision.

In this heartwarming tale of friendship and self-discovery, Kouichi and Coo navigate the complexities of growing up and the challenges that come with being different. Together, they embark on a journey to find a place where Coo can truly belong and uncover the hope for a brighter future.
